email_subject: Following up: Speaking at Hospitality Tech Conference 2025
email_body:
Hi Jane,

I wanted to follow up on my previous email about speaking at Hospitality Tech Conference 2025. I recently published a case study on how AI-powered guest experience automation increased satisfaction scores by 40% at a major hotel chain - I think this would resonate strongly with your audience.

Would you be open to a quick call to discuss potential topics?

Best regards
